chemdistiller.utils package¶

Submodules¶

chemdistiller.utils.base64 module¶

decode_from_base64(encstring)[source]¶

DecodeFromBase64(encstring:string):bytearray

Decodes Base64 encoded string into bytearray. String length must be of multiple of 4 and it should only contain the following symbols:

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=

with ‘=’ indicating the padding at the end of the string only.

encode_to_base64(btarray)[source]¶

EncodeToBase64(btarray: bytearray):string; - Converts bytearray input into Base64 encoded string, padding as necessary;
